## Credits  
This web application was made possible by funding through the New York's Great Lakes Basin Small Grants Program (made possible by the New York State Environmental Protection Fund and Article 14 of Environmental Conservation Law) and by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration's Bay Watershed Education and Training (B-WET) program.  
  
Content was developed by UFI staff and volunteers and workstudy students from the New York State College of Environmental Science and Forestry.  

Application was made using R, RStudio and the following packages:  
shiny, lubridate, plyr, dplyr, tidyr, ggplot2, leaflet, scales, knitr, shinycssloaders, shinydashboardPlus, stringi
  
## Privacy Policy
